body_html: Feed dict overhead is essentially the cost of doing an extra memcpy (Python->TensorFlow CPU->TensorFlow GPU) vs. using native ops like queues which do (TensorFlow CPU->TensorFlow GPU). So if this memcpy is small, there should be negligible.
